title: 萌新求教！
author: CUMT_Coal
txt_content: 新人报到！想请问一下怎么下载正版游戏呢？谢谢各位大佬了！

replies.author: Realstorm
replies.txt_content:
到Minecraft官网注册[url=https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/]
然后支付就行了

replies.author: CUMT_Coal
replies.txt_content:

然后支付就行了
